# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other drill positions found) and a furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Examples of burner entities include burner mining drills and burner inserters.

### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that offshore pumps have a power source before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty before attempting to use them.
- Ensure that pipe groups have a power source before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the provided execution logs. 
No important variables have been assigned in the provided execution logs.
